name: Plubertium
description:
Guinevere Bean, a 16 year old Earthling is woefully under-prepared for an intergalactic exchange to the planet Plubertium.

Help to guide Guin through her first days on Plub. Connect with your host family, learn to play the Plumbian nose flute and befriend local cool kids. Choose what to focus on, and if you start feeling anxious, just remember it's not the end of the world.

Controls:
Mouse - left clicks
keyboard - direction buttons & space
***

This game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49, under the theme 'Unstable'

Story & concept: Nanna & Ben Venterausch.

Music & sounds: Haezer.

Art & editing: Nanna Venterausch.

Writing, code & photography: Ben Venterausch.

Thanks heaps for playing!
